meanings.sent1: When you eat slowly, it minishes your hunger.
meanings.sent2: The sunlight minishes as the day turns to night.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was to make the rabbit minishes into thin air.
meanings.sent4: Her smile minishes all the worries in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves minishes into the distance.

meanings.definition: Diminish in size, amount, or degree.
meanings.sent1: If you cut the cake into smaller pieces, it minishes in size.
meanings.sent2: The number of candies minishes with each passing minute.
meanings.sent3: The balloon minishes in size as the air leaks out.
meanings.sent4: His patience minishes like a melting ice cube.
meanings.sent5: The crowd minishes as the event comes to an end.
